scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run rtmp" "npm run me"
scripts.server: cd api && npm install && node server.js
scripts.client: cd client && npm install && npm start
scripts.rtmp: cd rtmpserver && npm install && node index.js
scripts.me: cd icall && npm install && node server.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run rtmp" "npm run me"
